title: FS: HOF, Off Backs, Gandil, Titus, Chase, etc
author: JCC

posts.post_title: FS: HOF, Off Backs, Gandil, Titus, Chase, etc
posts.post_content:
As always, open to offers. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.  All prices are DLVD.  ppff or check/money order accepted.

Jack Knight (w bat) – Sovereign – SGC 60 – $400
Jack Knight (portrait) – Sovereign – PSA 6 (highest PSA Graded) – SOLD
John Titus – EPDG – SGC 40 – $365
Chick Gandil – EPDG (name at top) – SGC 20 – SOLD
Hughie Jennings (One Hand) – Old Mill – PSA 1 – SOLD 
Hughie Jennings (One Hand) – Polar Bear – SGC 10 – SOLD
John McGraw (Glove at Hip) – Piedmont (case is chipped) – SGC 10 – SOLD
Vic Willis (w bat) – Polar Bear – SGC 10 – $80 PENDING
Jack Chesbro – Piedmont – PSA 2.5 – SOLD
Jack Chesbro – Piedmont (resides in GAI case) – SOLD
Ed Abbaticchio (blue sleeves) – Sovereign – SGC 10 - SOLD
Jack Powell – EPDG – PSA 1.5 – SOLD
Heinie Zimmerman – Old Mill – SGC 40 – $250
Hal Chase (Blue Portrait) – Old Mill – SGC 10 – SOLD
Fred Tenney - Hindu - PSA 3 - SOLD

Let's go with:
Ed Abbaticchio (blue sleeves) – Sovereign
:D
Can I take the Hal Chase Old Mill please?
Lowered prices on all remaining cards.
lowered prices again...feel free to shoot me offers.  thx
another price reduction on all that are left.  if you think they are still too high, feel free to make an offer :)

Received the Abbaticchio today. 
Super fast shipping !!    Very pleased !
Thanks !!
Thanks Brian...glad you like the card.  One more round of price cuts, and I added a nice PSA 3 Tenney Hindu!
sold a couple more, lowered prices again on the rest.
A wonderfully packaged box has arrived. Trying hard to contain my excitement
lowered prices on these as well.
